android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.description: Access fine location sources, such as the Global Positioning System on the phone, where available. Malicious applications can use this to determine where you are and may consume additional battery power.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

com.google.android.c2dm.permission.RECEI.description: Permission for cloud to device messaging.

com.pixel.art.coloring.color.number.perm.description: Allows the application to receive push notifications.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

manifest_analysis.title:
App has a Network Security Configuration
[android:networkSecurityConfig]
manifest_analysis.desc: The Network Security Configuration feature lets apps customize their network security settings in a safe, declarative configuration file without modifying app code. These settings can be configured for specific domains and for a specific app.
manifest_analysis.name: App has a Network Security Configuration [android:networkSecurityConfig]

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.google.firebase.MessagingUnityPlayerActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Activity (com.google.firebase.auth.internal.FederatedSignInActivity) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.firebase.auth.api.gms.permission.LAUNCH_FEDERATED_SIGN_IN
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

manifest_analysis.title: TaskAffinity is set for Activity </br>(io.presage.core.activity.SBActivity)
manifest_analysis.desc: If taskAffinity is set, then other application could read the Intents sent to Activities belonging to another task. Always use the default setting keeping the affinity as the package name in order to prevent sensitive information inside sent or received Intents from being read by another application.
manifest_analysis.name: TaskAffinity is set for Activity

playstore_details.title: Happy Color™ – Color by Number
playstore_details.description:
Happy Color™ – Color by number is number 1 paint by number & coloring book on Google Play. 

Happy Color™ is a color by number game for adults. There are so many colorful, outstanding pictures to color!

All 5000 of them are free. We have a great number of categories in our paint by number app:
🐼 Animals. Just find the cutest buddy you want to color 
🌇 Places. Find pictures of the real places and unique buildings beautifully painted in our coloring book
🤼‍♂️ Hobbies like sports, music, board games, puzzles and other coloring pages  
🌺 Flowers. The most beautiful and exotic flowers are already painted, all you need to do is to color them in our coloring by number book

And this is only a small part of the pictures we have in Happy Color. Open the game and you will find people, mosaic, mandala, horoscopes, fantasy, art and many more coloring pages.

Coloring has never been so easy, all pictures are marked by numbers. Open your color by number book 📕 and rediscover the simple relaxation and joy of coloring ❤. Paint and share your favorite adult coloring pages with friends and family 👨👩👧👦, let everyone see your fantastic coloring pages 🖼!

Colour your life with our adult coloring book Happy Color 🌺!

 You never get bored, there are more than 5000 free pictures in our coloring book 📖, and we are constantly adding new images for you.

TM & © Hanna-Barbera  © 2019 WBEI

We are constantly working to make our coloring book better, please, share your feedbacks: support@x-flow.app

Join our Facebook community and enjoy more pics everyday: https://mobile.facebook.com/happycolorbynumber/


Terms of Use: www.x-flow.app/terms-of-use.html
Privacy Policy: www.x-flow.app/privacy-policy.html
playstore_details.summary: Paint by number 5000 free pictures, color & play the best puzzle board game
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Paint by number 5000 free pictures, color & play the best puzzle board game
playstore_details.developerAddress:
Ioanni Kondylaki, 46 Q TOWER, Flat/Office 4
6042 Larnaca, Cyprus
playstore_details.recentChanges:
Hello, Happy Colorfans!

There is always room for improvement.
New update is out!
-Bugs with sharing pics are fixed! 
The issue with the line color is solved, and we've improved the quality of sharing pics, so now nothing can stop you from sending your favorite artworks to your family and friends.

Happy Coloring!
playstore_details.recentChangesHTML:
Hello, Happy Colorfans!

There is always room for improvement.
New update is out!
-Bugs with sharing pics are fixed!
The issue with the line color is solved, and we've improved the quality of sharing pics, so now nothing can stop you from sending your favorite artworks to your family and friends.

Happy Coloring!
